channel.title: CVE Feed for Samsung Mobile -- Bixby Vision
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Samsung Mobile -- Bixby Vision

item.title: CVE-2022-24003|2024-08-03T03:59:23.341Z -- samsung%20mobile -- bixby%20vision
item.description: Exposure of Sensitive Information vulnerability in Bixby Vision prior to version 3.7.50.6 allows attackers to access internal data of Bixby Vision via unprotected intent.

item.title: CVE-2022-23434|2024-08-03T03:43:45.932Z -- samsung%20mobile -- bixby%20vision
item.description: A vulnerability using PendingIntent in Bixby Vision prior to versions 3.7.60.8 in Android S(12), 3.7.50.6 in Andorid R(11) and below allows attackers to execute privileged action by hijacking and modifying the intent.
